conversation.content:
- 'Topic_Id': 0364b03e9150459cbbf
  'Name': Ask Questions
  'Topic_Description': Employees have questions about the tuition reimbursement
    process or policy.
  'Entity':
    79abecb08ebd4a18ae7:
      'Attribute_Name': reimbursement_type
      'Description': The type of educational expense for which the employee
        is seeking reimbursement.
    5ddc6d1f15f6472e9ed:
      'Attribute_Name': educational_level
      'Description': The level of education for which the employee is seeking
        reimbursement.
    e48cb8c311c842a1bb3:
      'Attribute_Name': reimbursement_policy
      'Description': The specific policy or program related to the employee's
        question.
- 'Topic_Id': 65feb3af6e2044998db
  'Name': View Status
  'Topic_Description': Employees want to check the status of their tuition reimbursement
    application.
  'Entity':
    32c6eb31105a4ee0b2f:
      'Attribute_Name': employee_id
      'Description': The identification number of the employee who submitted
        the tuition reimbursement application.
    9fcd5de5e4bb4ebe9e7:
      'Attribute_Name': application_date
      'Description': The date when the employee submitted the tuition reimbursement
        application.
- 'Topic_Id': 1b658ee0106240b3b65
  'Name': Check Eligibility
  'Topic_Description': Employees want to know if they meet the requirements for
    tuition reimbursement.
  'Entity':
    97fc82c7ac45409486d:
      'Attribute_Name': educational_level
      'Description': The level of education the employee is pursuing.
      'Example_values':
      - associate's degree
      - bachelor's degree
      - master's degree
      - doctorate degree
    3af5aa659c6646d9976:
      'Attribute_Name': employment_status
      'Description': The employee's current employment status.
    eb5bfbb4363844e2a85:
      'Attribute_Name': length_of_service
      'Description': The length of time the employee has been working for the
        company.
    e0b61aa1bb98419ab5b:
      'Attribute_Name': course_relevance
      'Description': Whether the course is relevant to the employee's job.
- 'Topic_Id': 863304b769744e51864
  'Name': Update Information
  'Topic_Description': Employees want to update their personal or educational information
    related to tuition reimbursement.
  'Entity':
    c634c3c8bb0048f9a15:
      'Attribute_Name': information_type
      'Description': The type of information that needs to be updated.
      'Example_values':
      - address
      - degree
      - institution
      - major
      - email
    bd25b5cd49f54f01a66:
      'Attribute_Name': new_value
      'Description': The new value for the information being updated.
- 'Topic_Id': 49324fb80e6c4781b30
  'Name': none of the above
  'Topic_Description': The utterance does not match any topics
